content: and hide the thread assembly 1 fix the leaves on the strawberry with pins then sew in the photo white lines indicate the places where two leaves are stitched together all the leaves should be attached in this way 2 use yellow yarn to embroider seeds on strawberries done thank you for crocheting with me 5 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- сrochet pattern by natalia erkhova www etsy com/shop/crochetbynataerkhova www facebook com/crochetbynataliaerkhova www instagram com/crochet_natalia
